page.title: 02WITHYHAM/ST.JOHN BY CAR cont
page.content: We turned right onto the main{road}at Lye Green junction. Large black{refuse bins stood outside the houses. There were traffic lights where frost damage to the road was being repaired. We passed a private estate called Park Grove. Further on there was a field with horse jumps in it. (Horseriding is a very popular{recreation}in this area.) We turned right into the lane which leads back to our school. In this lane, at the southern edge of our area is Cares Garage. In this short drive we had covered at least 75% of the roadway in our area. The eastern half of the{landscape}is almost totally woodland and farmland although the Ordnance Survey map shows that originally a Roman road passed through the southern part of FIve Acre Wood.
